abstract:
To analyze the features of isocitrate dehydrogenase 1 (IDH 1) mutation in 165 oligodendroglial tumors.
IDH1 was detected in a series of 165 oligodendroglial paraffin specimens from 2009 to 2011. And their features were analyzed.
Mutant IDH1 was detected in 111 (67.3%) tumors including 109 (98.2%) CGT→CAT mutations, 1 (0.9%) CGT→AGT mutation and 1 (0.9%) CGT→TGT mutation. The frequencies of IDH mutation in AO, O and OA were 13/15, 83.3% and 72.9% respectively. They were significantly higher than that in AOA (27.0%, P < 0.001).
The different frequencies of IDH1 mutation in different subsets of oligodendroglial tumors may imply varied tumorigenic pathways between subsets.
title: [Feature analysis of IDH1 mutation in oligodendroglial tumors].
